overview: "Face to Face" is a portrait of a youth that challenges itself and risk its life for tradition. They belong to a unique group of men who devote the best years of their youth to this group. The abide to the rules imposed by tradition and discipline of a hierarchy. Together they tesT the limits of their braveness and fear. In the arena, under the astound eyes of a silent audience, they put themselves to the test and risk their lives. In Portugal and in Mexico young forcados stand up to the bulls "face to face".
title: Face to Face
